title: Spooky Eyes
description: Draw a pair of staring eyes in the dark

steps.hint: To be extra spooky, we want to be able to move our eyes around. Letâ€™s use a variable. **Type** `y = 250`.
We'll move into position with a fixed x value and the variable 'y' that we created. **Type** `moveTo 150, y`.
Set the drawing color to white
Draw an ellipse, it's like a stretched circle - **type** `ellipse 60, 40`
Set the drawing color to black - **type** `color black`
Draw a circle with a size of 10 - **type** `circle 10`
Set the drawing color to white again
Now draw another ellipse with width 60 and height 40 -  **type** `ellipse 60, 40`
Set the drawing color to black
Finish it up by drawing a circle with a size of 10

completion_text: You Wizard! The next time I need spooky eyes I know who to call! Click and drag the slider over the y value on line two for a spooky effect.
